post:
Hello everyone,

Instant activation servers available:

1 x Quad Core Xeon E3-1230v2 / 16 GB RAM / 2 x 1000 GB SATA
4 cores @ 3.3 GHz.
Server management panel, IPMI, 1 IPv4 and 1 IPv6 included.
Port speed 1 Gbit
Traffic: 10 TB
Price: 30€

1 x Quad Core Xeon E3-1270v2 / 16 GB RAM / 2 x 480 GB SSD
4 cores @ 3.5 GHz
Server management panel, IPMI, 1 IPv4 and 1 IPv6 included.
Port speed 1 Gbit
Traffic: 10 TB
Price: 59€

1 x Hexa Core Xeon E-2286G / 64 GB RAM / 2 x 480 GB SSD
6 cores @ 4 GHz

Server management panel, IPMI, 1 IPv4 and 1 IPv6 included.
Port speed 1 Gbit
Traffic: 30 TB
Price: 99€

Other configuration also available with delivery time 1-5 working day. 
Setup fee: 0€
Additional IPv4 address price: 2€
Additional IPv6 address price: 0.01€

Order on site: https://www.robovps.biz/en/dedicated_servers/

Also disk space on FTP server is available for 1₽ per 1GB https://www.robovps.biz/en/backup-service/

Our KVM VPS VPS offers begin from 129₽ (~ 1,43€) per month. 

All services located in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
Looking glass available at https://www.robovps.biz/en/help/55-our_data_center.html
